1675010.name: Antonball Deluxe - Better Than Nothing DLC
1675010.description:
ANTONBALL DELUXE — BETTER THAN NOTHING DLC

When people ask us what our first DLC for Antonball Deluxe is going to be, we've always replied: Nothing! Literally Nothing! ...and BOY HOWDY, did we deliver:

In the ANTONBALL DELUXE: BETTER THAN NOTHING premium update, you can now play as the mysterious and alluring Nothing, Boiler City's most invisible citizen. Can you beat Antonball and Punchball when you can't even see yourself?

But as the name says, this is the BETTER than Nothing update!

So we went even further: this pack also includes A BRAND NEW extra world: "Classic Ball Training" — for both the ANTONBALL and PUNCHBALL modes! In "Classic Ball Training", players will go back in time to the era of Super-Hard bonus levels in the form of 10 newly designed stages featuring art from Antonball Classic! Requiring expert use of moves and mechanics, these levels will really bust some balls!

  • New Character, "Nothing". Players choosing to ball as Boiler City's most invisible citizen can challenge themselves to a new super-hard invisible mode!
  • New "CLASSIC BALL TRAINING" world added to both campaign modes, for only the most practiced and talented ballers!
1675010.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
